text: (18 June 1949 - 10 April 2010) was the President of the Republic of Poland from 2005 until his death in a plane crash in Smolensk, Russia on 10 April 2010.Polish president killed in plane crash, CNN.com Kaczyński served as Mayor of Warsaw from 2002,Serwis PKW – Wybory 2002 until the day before he became president. He was a Roman CatholicPoland President Kaczynski was a battler and was the identical twin brother of the Prime Minister of Poland, Jarosław Kaczyński.Cień generała (Shadow of the General), Newsweek Poland issue 9 from 2 March 2008 ==Related pages== * Death and state funeral of Lech Kaczyński and Maria Kaczyńska ==References== == Other websites == * Official site * Category:1949 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Aviation deaths Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish Roman Catholics Category:Mayors of Warsaw Category:Presidents of Poland Category:Recipients of the Order of the White Eagle (Poland) Category:Twin people
title: Lech Kaczyński
